TopicTitle: Tweakables for Ladders and air intakes

Articles.Content:
Hello, i don't know if it's intended or not in 0.23, but the ladders and the air intakes does not have a dialog in the VAB / SPH to allow us to set their state before launch like the other parts. (air intakes closed / opened, ladders deployed / not deployed).

it could be interesting to be able to set those up in the VAB (for example, some of the air intakes can allow to build nice hulls for ships, but we will have to close them before liftoff to limit the drag)

Regards,

I think this belongs to suggestions rather to bug reports as that does not have any serious impact on the game, but would be nice to have.

I could add that it would be also nice to be able to tweak initial state of communication devices.
Very correct there, Kasuha. We simply did not have the time to add in Tweakables for every part, rest assured though we've got a nice big list of those that we want to add in.

Well, i thought of it as a possible bug, because the air intakes have an interface similar to the engines when inflight.

If it's not a bug, maybe a mod can move this thread to the suggestions Subforum ?

Also, as kasuha said, being able to set the antenna's state in the vab / sph would be great too it would help a lot for improving the various spacecrafts looks without needing to launch them first (especially when we want to simply tweak the various locations, to make sure an antenna does not clip weirdly through another part for example)
